message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $150 is a bit too high for me right now.  I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $130.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $130 is still a bit above my budget.  Let's split the difference - I'll pay $125 for the product.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $128.
